name: Angelos Arnis - Towards a holistic and inclusive design practice
description:
Friends of Figma Athens #4 - Online event:


-

Angelos Arnis

Senior Designer, Design System Lead

Posti


Angelos is a strategic designer focusing on delivering experiences with humane & ethical principles. Currently transforming Joint Futures & changing the ways of working at Posti Group, Finland. He is a Senior Designer and Design System Lead at Posti will open up the discussion towards a holistic and inclusive design practice.
